comments: Subsequence of A125308, the reflectable primes. - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jul 16 2014
references: N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
C. W. Trigg, "Reflective Primes", J. Rec. Math., 15 (1983), 251-256.
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
prog: (Haskell)a007628 n = a007628_list !! (n-1)a007628_list = filter f a125308_list where   f p = a010051' q == 1 && q /= p  where q = a004086 p-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jul 16 2014
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, _Mira Bernstein_, _Robert G. Wilson v_
